name: Lumbear
description:
Once a bear found this old ugly tree and decided to cut it down with his paws. But it turned out to be incredibly long...

Atmospheric clicker game where you have to cut down a part of a tree in one direction or another in time. Break the tree, earn money, buy skins that completely change the look of the game. Skins appear in the store with game updates! Follow development in 5 hex social media.

Some items are available in the store only with special promo codes. Look for them where 5 hex is located!
